title: Kyou no 5 no 2 (TV): Takarabako
title_synonyms: Kyou no Go no Ni OVA 2
Kyou no Go no Ni (2008) OVA
synopsis: An OVA bundled with the limited edition of the tankobon of the Kyou no Go no Ni manga. The staff and the cast of the OVA are the same as those of the Kyou no Go no Ni TV anime.
opening_themes: "Kitakaze (キタカゼ)" by Friends: Yuu Kobayashi, Asami Shimoda, MAKO, Satomi Akesaka, Youko Honda, Kana Asumi
ending_themes: "Daibakuhatsu NO.1 「大爆発 NO.1」" by Friends: Yuu Kobayashi, Asami Shimoda, MAKO, Satomi Akesaka, Youko Honda, Kana Asumi (ep 1)
"Yuuyake Iro 「ユウヤケイロ」" by Friends: Yuu Kobayashi, Asami Shimoda, MAKO, Satomi Akesaka, Youko Honda, Kana Asumi (ep 1)
"Negai 「願い」" by Friends: Yuu Kobayashi, Asami Shimoda, MAKO, Satomi Akesaka, Youko Honda, Kana Asumi (ep 1)
"secret base ~Kimi ga Kureta Mono~ 「secret base ～君がくれたもの～」" by Friends: Yuu Kobayashi, Asami Shimoda, MAKO, Satomi Akesaka, Youko Honda, Kana Asumi (ep 1)
